mapper.update: update goods set g_type = #{g_type}, g_name = #{g_name}, g_price = #{g_price}, g_qty = #{g_qty}, g_pic_name = #{g_pic_name} where g_no = #{g_no}
mapper.select: select c_no, c_name, c_qty, g_no, rs_no, user_id, c_price, (select g.g_pic_name from goods g where c.g_no = g.g_no) as g_pic_name from cart c where user_id = #{user_id} order by c_no desc
